ids_info.name: transport_solver_numerics
ids_info.description: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details

transport_solver_numerics/time_step.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/time_step
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics
FIELD_NAME: time_step
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> time_step

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Internal time step used by the transport solver (assuming all transport equations are solved with the same time step)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[transport_solver_numerics]: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details

transport_solver_numerics/primary_coordi.documentation:

FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/primary_coordinate
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1

PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics
FIELD_NAME: primary_coordinate
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> primary_coordinate

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Primary coordinate system with which the transport equations are solved. For a 1D transport solver: index = 1 means rho_tor_norm; 2 = rho_tor.

transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d
FIELD_NAME: grid
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Radial grid

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[transport_solver_numerics]: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d]: Numerics related to 1D radial solver, for various time slices.

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid/rho_tor_norm
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
FIELD_NAME: rho_tor_norm
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid -> rho_tor_norm

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Normalized toroidal flux coordinate. The normalizing value for rho_tor_norm, is the toroidal flux coordinate at the equilibrium boundary (LCFS or 99.x % of the LCFS in case of a fixed boundary equilibium calculation, see time_slice/boundary/b_flux_pol_norm in the equilibrium IDS) 

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[transport_solver_numerics]: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d]: Numerics related to 1D radial solver, for various time slices.
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid]: Radial grid

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid/rho_tor
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
FIELD_NAME: rho_tor
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid -> rho_tor

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Toroidal flux coordinate = sqrt(phi/(pi*b0)), where the toroidal magnetic field, b0, corresponds to that stored in vacuum_toroidal_field/b0 and pi can be found in the IMAS constants

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[transport_solver_numerics]: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d]: Numerics related to 1D radial solver, for various time slices.
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid]: Radial grid

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid/rho_pol_norm
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
FIELD_NAME: rho_pol_norm
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid -> rho_pol_norm

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Normalized poloidal flux coordinate = sqrt((psi(rho)-psi(magnetic_axis)) / (psi(LCFS)-psi(magnetic_axis)))

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[transport_solver_numerics]: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d]: Numerics related to 1D radial solver, for various time slices.
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid]: Radial grid

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid/psi
IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
FIELD_NAME: psi
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid -> psi

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Poloidal magnetic flux. Integral of magnetic field passing through a contour defined by the intersection of a flux surface passing through the point of interest and a Z=constant plane. If the integration surface is flat, the surface normal vector is in the increasing vertical coordinate direction, Z, namely upwards.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[transport_solver_numerics]: Numerical quantities used by transport solvers and convergence details
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d]: Numerics related to 1D radial solver, for various time slices.
CONTAINER[transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid]: Radial grid

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===

HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
FIELD_NAME: volume
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid -> volume

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Volume enclosed inside the magnetic surface

IDS: transport_solver_numerics
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: transport_solver_numerics/solver_1d/grid
FIELD_NAME: psi_magnetic_axis
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: transport_solver_numerics -> solver_1d -> grid -> psi_magnetic_axis
